condition.narrative: Schedule 2. Section I.A.1 No later than 60 days after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall establish and thereafter maintain,during implementation of the Project, the Project Steering Committee (PSC)
Schedule 2. Section I.A.2.(a)(i) No later than 30 days after the Effective Date or such later date as the Association may agree,appoint provincial teams in each of the participating provinces
